meanings.definition: Chelonians: a group of reptiles that includes turtles, tortoises, and terrapins.
meanings.sent1: I saw a group of chelonians at the zoo today.
meanings.sent2: Chelonians are fascinating creatures that live both on land and in water.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chelonians throw a party? Because they wanted to shell-ebrate!
meanings.sent4: The slow and steady chelonians remind me to take life at my own pace.
meanings.sent5: The ancient chelonians have been around for millions of years, adapting to various environments.
